question:
Consider the following statements about Zila Swachh Bharat Preraks (ZSBPs):
  1. These are professionals who will provide their “technical and management support” in identified districts for the Swachh Bharat Abhiyan
  2. The programme is being implemented with joint effort of Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation and Tata trust
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation:
Both are correct statements
Zila Swachh Bharat Preraks (ZSBPs) are professionals who provide their technical and management support in identified districts. The programme is being implemented with joint effort of Ministry of Drinking Water and Sanitation and Tata trust. The government has identified 600 professionals who will lend their support to district administrations across the country in the implementation of Swachh Bharat Mission.
